A2 a title used before the family name or full name of a woman, used to avoid saying if she is married or not: Ms Hill/Ms Paula Hill [ as form of address ] What can I do for you, Ms Wood? Compare
Miss
Mr
Mrs
More examplesFewer examplesTheir teacher is Ms Allen.Although she's married, she prefers the title 'Ms'.There's a Ms McKinnon in reception for you.
